Based on epidemiological data, select cases/clusters to trace Collect records at Point of Service and identify shipments and suppliers of interest From POS info, document each subsequent level in supply chain Either narrow or expand depending on: – records available; – number of shipments in time frame of interest; and – ability to link shipments and items within the shipment
